text: Jim Branagan (born 3 July 1955) is an English former footballer who played in the Football League as a full back for Oldham Athletic, Huddersfield Town, Blackburn Rovers, Preston North End and York City, and also in South Africa for Cape Town City. Born in Urmston, Lancashire, Branagan began his professional career at Oldham Athletic, aged 18. He retired in 1989, later working at a Tesco store in Pendleton, Greater Manchester. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:People from Urmston Category:Sportspeople from Lancashire Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Cape Town City F.C. title: Jim Branagan
